26 #ifndef TILEDARRAY_UTIL_TIME_H__INCLUDED
27 #define TILEDARRAY_UTIL_TIME_H__INCLUDED
28 
29 #include <chrono>
30 
31 namespace TiledArray {
32 
33 using time_point = std::chrono::high_resolution_clock::time_point;
34 
35 inline time_point now() { return std::chrono::high_resolution_clock::now(); }
36 
37 inline std::chrono::system_clock::time_point system_now() {
38  return std::chrono::system_clock::now();
39 }
40 
41 inline double duration_in_s(time_point const &t0, time_point const &t1) {
42  return std::chrono::duration<double>{t1 - t0}.count();
43 }
44 
45 inline int64_t duration_in_ns(time_point const &t0, time_point const &t1) {
46  return std::chrono::duration_cast<std::chrono::nanoseconds>(t1 - t0).count();
47 }
48 
49 } // namespace TiledArray
50 
51 #endif // TILEDARRAY_UTIL_TIME_H__INCLUDED
